titleStmt.title: James W. Neville to Thomas E. Bramlett
CWG12510

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Union Artillery, Navy and Marines Primary Source Documents ; Misc U.S.C.T. Primary Source Documents
msIdentifier.idno: Box 14, Folder BTRY C - 1st REGT LIGHT ARTILLERY 3nd BTRY OFFICERS

body.p:
Louisville Ky Sep 20 1863
To Hon T. E. Bramlette
Gov State of Ky
Dear Sir

I have the Honor of recomending as a Senior 2d Lieut for 3d Ky Battery Lieut Germain Deitwelter who has a Commission for Recruiting for the 50th Ky Mntd Infty,, he has had an order to consolidate his company with the 3d Ky Battery as Artillery, the order was revoked, and he now wishes to receive a Commission as Senior 2d Lieut in the 3d Ky Battery, and I know of no man whom I would more cherefully reccomend to the position as a well Drilled Artillerist and a gentleman hoping this will meet with your favor I remain

Very Respectfully
Your Obt Servt
Capt Jno W Neville
Comdg 3d Ky Battery
